Sample.Title: etv2 positive cells

Channel.Growth-Protocol: zebrafish embryos were raised at 28.5 deg. centigrade
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Single cells suspension was achieved using cold protease tissue dissociation protocol, Potter and Potter, 2019RNA libraries were prepared for sequencing using standard Illumina protocols

Sample.Data-Processing: The fastq files obtained from sequencing were mapped to the Danio rerio genome (version zv11) to generate single-cell feature counts using Cell Ranger version 3.0.2.Filtered matrix files were imported into Partek Flow analysis Suite (partek.com).The gene count CPM (counts per million) values were normalized by adding 1.0 and calculating log2 values.Features (genes) were filtered to exclude values of 0 in at least 99.9% of cells. Two samples were combined and graph-based clustering was performed using PCA=15. Subsequently, UMAP plots were obtained and exported from Partek.Supplementary_files_format_and_content: Matrix table with raw gene counts for every gene and every sample

Sample.Title: jam2b positive cells

Channel.Growth-Protocol: zebrafish embryos were raised at 28.5 deg. centigrade
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Single cells suspension was achieved using cold protease tissue dissociation protocol, Potter and Potter, 2019RNA libraries were prepared for sequencing using standard Illumina protocols

Sample.Data-Processing: The fastq files obtained from sequencing were mapped to the Danio rerio genome (version zv11) to generate single-cell feature counts using Cell Ranger version 3.0.2.Filtered matrix files were imported into Partek Flow analysis Suite (partek.com).The gene count CPM (counts per million) values were normalized by adding 1.0 and calculating log2 values.Features (genes) were filtered to exclude values of 0 in at least 99.9% of cells. Two samples were combined and graph-based clustering was performed using PCA=15. Subsequently, UMAP plots were obtained and exported from Partek.Supplementary_files_format_and_content: Matrix table with raw gene counts for every gene and every sample

Series.Title: Single-cell transcriptomic analysis of 36 hpf Zebrafish etv2 and jam2b positive cells
Series.Summary: We performed single-cell RNAseq analysis of FACs sorted etv2 and jam2b psoitive cells from etv2Gt(2A-Venus) ; jam2bGt(2A-Gal4);UAS:NTR-mCherry zebrafish embryos at 36 hpf using 10x Genomics' Chromium platform. 18 distinct cell populations were identified including vascular endothelial cells and LPM cells.
Series.Overall-Design: Transgenic etv2Gt(2A-Venus) fish were crossed to jam2bGt(2A-Gal4);UAS:NTR-mCherry fish. Whole embryos at 36 hpf were then dissociated into a single-cell suspension by cold protease tissue dissociation protocol. Cells expressing Venus only, mCherry only, and both (Venus and mCherry) were sorted using a BD/FACSAria II flow cytometer cell sorter. After sorting, cells expressing both Venus and mCherry were equally divided and added into the Venus only and mCherry only populations manually. Barcoding of cells and and cDNA library construction was carried out using 10X Genomics' Chromium platform.
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
